snippet: Major League Soccer Commissioner Don Garber said Wednesday that he was "surprised" by the recent criticism of the league by FIFA's president, Sepp Blatter.
abstract: Major League Soccer Commissioner Don Garber said Wednesday that he was "surprised" by the recent criticism of the league by FIFA's president, Sepp Blatter.

headline.main: Garber 'Surprised' by Blatter's Criticism of M.L.S.
headline.print_headline: Surprised by Criticism From FIFA, M.L.S. Commissioner Cites Progress
